products.title: Grilled Beef Steak with Mushroom sauce
products.description: Indulge in the mouthwatering delight of a perfectly grilled beef steak generously topped with a rich and savory mushroom sauce.

products.title: Green salad with mashed potatots
products.description: A refreshing green salad paired with creamy mashed potatoes, creating a perfect blend of flavors and textures.

products.title: Fresh vegetable salad
products.description: Enjoy a burst of freshness with our chef's special fresh vegetable salad, featuring a variety of seasonal veggies and a zesty dressing.

products.title: Mixed salad with strawberries and watermelon
products.description: Savor the sweetness of mixed salad with the delightful addition of juicy strawberries and crisp watermelon. A perfect summer treat!

products.title: Vegan strawberry cake
products.description: Indulge in the guilt-free pleasure of our Vegan Strawberry Cake - a delicious blend of fresh strawberries and moist cake, topped with vegan frosting.
